structurized.structures.disable_all_stru: All structures will be disabled, each of the options below will not work
structurized.structures.biomes_descripti: Structure can be found in the following biomes:
structurized.structures.warning: Bear in mind that every structure can still possibly be enabled or disabled by individual mods and datapacks.
structurized.exception.all_structures_ar: Can't locate any structure, all structures are disabled based on the Structurized mod config.
structurized.exception.structure_is_disa: Can't locate %s structure, structure is currently disabled based on the Structurized mod config.
gui.structurized.structure_sets.title: Structure Sets
Spacing is average distance in chunks between the structures from same structure set (group of structures).
gui.structurized.structure_sets.separati:
Separation is minimum distance in chunks between the structures in the same structure set (group of structures).
Value can not be bigger than spacing.
gui.structurized.structure_spread.title: Structure spread
gui.structurized.structure_spread.descri:
Configure custom structure spread either via global spacing and separation modifiers or per structure specific spacing and separation values

Spacing is average distance in chunks between the structures from the same structure set(group).

Separation is minimum distance in chunks between the structures from the same structure set(group).
Separation value should not be bigger than spacing value.
